dinner.description: Festive dinner served at the tables.

party.title: Dance Party
party.description: Music starts and the celebration begins.

Gallery.description: We would like to keep these moments forever. We would be happy if you could share your photos from this day with us!
Gallery.descriptionExtra: Help us capture these beautiful moments. All the photos you take during the wedding can be shared in our common album.

accommodation.a: For guests from outside the Tri-City, we recommend hotels near Artus Court. We will be happy to help with reservations.

transport.q: How to get from the church to the venue?
transport.a: The church and the wedding venue are within a short walking distance (about 5 minutes) through the historic center of Gdańsk.

children.a: We invite all guests listed on the invitations. If your invitation includes children, they will be very welcome!

parking.a: Artus Court is located in a pedestrian zone. We recommend parking lots at Ogarna Street or near Forum Gdańsk.

RSVP.deadline: We would be very pleased if you confirm your attendance by April 20, 2028.
RSVP.footerText: We can't wait to see you!

form.messagePlaceholder: If you would like to tell us something...
form.emailError: Please provide a valid email address.

Story.imageAlt1: Marzena & Wojciech by the Motława River
Story.quote: From the first meeting by the Motława river, to a journey together full of passion and dreams...
Story.historyParagraph1: It all started with a chance meeting that over time turned into the most beautiful adventure of our lives. Gdańsk, with its historical charm and sea breeze, became the backdrop for our most important moments.
Story.historyParagraph2: Today, enriched by hundreds of shared sunsets and thousands of hours spent talking, we stand at the threshold of a new path.
Story.futureParagraph1: We invite you to celebrate together the day we say our sacramental "I DO". It is a great honor for us to share this joy with you — our family and friends.
Story.futureParagraph2: It is here, in the heart of beautiful Gdańsk, that we want to start the next chapter of our story.
